Deployment Plan: /tmp/bundle -> GitHub Pages
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Expected URL: https://example.github.io/repo

Steps:
  1. Prepare workflow (optional) [confirm]
     $ echo prepare
  2. Deploy bundle
     $ gh workflow run deploy.yml

Warnings:
  ⚠ Ensure Pages source is set to GitHub Actions
  ⚠ First deployment may take a few minutes

Files to generate:
  - /tmp/bundle/.nojekyll
  - /tmp/bundle/_headers
